Set #41048 Lion Cub’s Savannah: The new cat animal sculpt is used again in Series 6, from tiger to lion we have another big cat in small cub animal form. Is this set worthy of picking up? You’ll find out after the pros and cons of the set in my conclusion for the set.

column2: Habitat build is interesting for its limited use of parts, lacks anything too unique for colours unfortunately; however is still a fun little build and would look great as part of the LEGO Heartlake Zoo build these 2014 Animal sets have been aiming towards.
Awesome looking miniature tree build in this set.
Habitat build does not include any real play features for the set. It’s more of a display piece honestly.
Bows and animals just do not work well, LEGO should have tried out a different idea for these animal sculpts.

column1: I would recommend this set to complete the collection really. The build is actually a great display piece as well and would fit in quite well for a zoo display, like most of the 2014 LEGO Friends animals sets. The way the little tree is built is quite clever too to give it that slanted look. I enjoy all of the great Animal pieces that LEGO has introduced as well.
